Package cycling

Class Stage

java.lang.Object
cycling.Stage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
class Stage extends Object implements Serializable
Stage class.
Represents a single stage in the cycling competition.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final String
    description
    The description of the stage.
    private final int
    id
    The ID of the stage.
    private final double
    length
    The length of the stage.
    private final String
    name
    The name of the stage.
    private static int
    noOfStages
    The number of instances of Stage, automatically incremented when the constructor is called.
    Used for allocation of IDs.
    private boolean
    prepared
    Whether the stage is prepared (has results associated with it) or not.
    private ArrayList<Segment>
    segments
    An ArrayList of Segment objects contained in the stage.
    private final LocalDateTime
    startTime
    The start time of the race.
    private final StageType
    type
    The stage's type.
    Taken from the StageType enum.

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Stage(String name, String description, double length, LocalDateTime startTime, StageType type)
    Stage class constructor.
    Assigns a name, a description, a length, a start time, a type and an automatic ID using the number of instances of stage.
